Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Ili ndi Buku limene mulibe chokaikitsa, ulangizi kwa anthu oopa Mulungu
Amene amakhulupirira mu chinthu chosaoneka ndipo amapemphera pa nthawi yake ndipo amapereka kwa anthu osowa zina mwa zinthu zimene tawapatsa
Ndi amene amakhulupirira mu zimene zavumbulutsidwa kwa iwe ndiponso zimene zinavumbulutsidwa kale iwe usanadze ndipo amakhulupirira kwathunthu mâ€™moyo umene uli nkudza
Amenewa ndiwo amene ali pa njira yoyenera ya Ambuye wawo ndipo ndiwo opambana
